summary: A teenage boy discovers his unruly neighbour is really a disgraced Rock God who "died" 8 years ago owing a fortune in unpaid tax. The boy agrees not to reveal his secret on condition that he teaches him the dark arts of Rock Guitar.
cast: Luke Perry|Nicholas Galitzine|Lisa Dillon|Verity Pinter|Simon Lowe|James Tarpey|Eleanor Herdman|Ewen MacIntosh|Ian Virgo|Christian O'Connell|Dhani Mattioni-Sharma|Elisabeth Hopper|Fiona Gillies|Michael MÃ¼ller|Charlotte Palmer|Sarah Flind|Hannah Watkins|Alice Hickey|Benjamin Colbourne|Andreas Lim|Jeremy Hill|Louis Mueller|Walker Hill|Jude Ryan-Gray|Luke Gordon|Jazz Blaack|Sapphire Cartledge|Mark Fenton|Caitlin Brewer|Simon Allen|Craig Osborne|Tudor Smith|Henna Lone|Jonell Rowe|Sue Bardwell|Jacky Perry|Evelien Kortum|Carol Austin|Karen Davey|Len Waterman|Pam Vernon|Saudiq Baoku|Brigitta Makk|Sheree Wallace|Jackie Bridford|David Hyndman|Amy Frost|Nathan Benson|Derek Allassani|Philip Senior|Steve Cowles|Gavin Smith|River Chandler
title: The Beat Beneath My Feet
